name: Crouch Crawl
description:
Developed by Kevin Boatz for the 2017 GMTK Game Jam.
Consists of a couple levels made using free time over a weekend.

Reach the finish by crouching and crawling!

Relation to theme - I thought about how in many platformers, the jump is what has extensive dual purpose design. I wanted to make a game where the crouch was used for everything, instead.

Controls:
Left & Right - Move
Down - Crouch
Mouse - Select items on menu
Esc - Quit game

Intended platform - Windows(7)

Resources - Developed in GameMaker:Studio/Audio composed in DefleMask Tracker

Credits - Everything by: Kevin Boatz
